name: Arcade Prototype
description:
You find your self lost in a arcade with nothing left to do but to play...

This is a platformer where you have to jump, double jump , wall jump, climb and dash to traverse the Arcade

**DISCLAIMER**

None of the game mechanics or art is final this is just a prototype to  test the main gameplay mechanics.

Proggraming and Art by;

Litefeather.

Music by;

Marcus Maldonado
